LanguageData.Ammo_3HST76mmRG_Steel.label: 3HST 76mm Steel Railgun Shell (Sabot)
LanguageData.Ammo_3HST76mmRG_Steel.description: Large caliber railgun shells used by a variety of 3HST-made heavy weapons, including tank guns and corvette main guns.\nThis shell is a solid penetrator.
LanguageData.Ammo_3HST76mmRG_HE.label: 3HST 76mm Steel Railgun Shell (AP_HE)
LanguageData.Ammo_3HST76mmRG_HE.description: Large caliber railgun shells used by a variety of 3HST-made heavy weapons, including tank guns and corvette main guns.\nThis shell is a explosive filling behind a half-length penetrator.
LanguageData.Projectile_3HST76mmRG_Steel.label: 76mm Railgun shell (Sabot)
LanguageData.Projectile_3HST76mmRG_HE.label: 76mm Railgun shell (AP-HE)
LanguageData.Projectile_3HST76mmRG_Steel_ID.label: 76mm Railgun shell (Sabot)
LanguageData.Projectile_3HST76mmRG_HE_ID.label: 76mm Railgun shell (AP-HE)
